text: Learning Web Development-Choosing a Language and Framework
This is a subjective question and let me make it clear that I AM NOT asking for what the best language is.
That being said, I want to do web development.
I want to create sites around various topics, some for myself and some to sell and also do freelance down the road.
I would also like to be able to create applications (RIAish and Web 2.0ish).
Currently I'm looking at both C#/.NET and Python/Django (I like Ruby but had problems keeping it working on my machine).
I also can't help but feel that I should reasonably consider php considering its dominance in these areas but I've heard so often that it leads to poor practice.
At some point it may also be nice to do mobile programming but not a priority.
I would really really appreciate hearing the thoughts of you, the experts on this topic as I feel ready to lose it after bouncing to different languages.
